The `Ticket to Ride: The Card Game` is a version of the popular `Ticket to Ride` that has been adapted to used with a deck of cards in place of the game board. A description of the game can be found [here](https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/34127/ticket-to-ride-the-card-game).
